Dabestr comes inbuilt with datasets for each type of estimation plot. To load in
the datasets, simple call: `data("name_of_dataset")`.

## List of available datasets:
- "twogroup_data"
- "multigroup_data"
- "my.data.prorportional"
- "minimeta_data"
- "deltadelta_data"
